description: Homemade vegan ravioli is easier than you think, and delicious too! Made with homemade pasta dough stuffed with creamy dairy-free ricotta basil filling, serve them with your favorite sauce for a delicious and comforting meal!
name: Vegan Ravioli
recipeIngredient: 3 cups all-purpose flour, (plus more for kneading and rolling)
2 tablespoons olive oil, (plus more for the bowl)
1 cup raw cashews, (soaked in water 4-8 hours, rinsed and drained)
3 1/2 ounces firm or extra firm tofu (one fourth of a 14 ounce package), (drained)
1/4 cup finely chopped fresh basil leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Stir the flour and salt together in a medium mixing bowl, then stir in the water and olive oil. Mix until a dough is formed.
Turn the dough onto a lightly floured surface and knead it until it's smooth and elastic, about 5 minutes.
Coat the inside of a large bowl with olive oil and place the dough inside. Cover the bowl with a damp kitchen towel and let the dough rest for 30 minutes.
